Steps:
1.Open OpenUP
2.Open Capability Pattern "inception_phase_iteration"
3.Open the Activity Diagram, Activity Detail Diagram and Work Product Dependency Diagram of "Initiate Project". These three editors are dirty
4.Create a new Method Library from the menu bar
5.Click "Next" to save all editors. Then click "Finish"

All editors will not be closed. Activity Detail Diagram editor will have a dirty flag

6.Reopen OpenUP without saving
7.Open those three diagrams of "inception_phase_iteration"

All editors will be dirty

There is a buggy behaviour if you try to File | New a method library while the xiesting library has a process edior open with AD, ADD, WPD are opnw on the same activities, i.e. all those editors are either not prompted for saving and closing, or saving with exceptions, and new library creation is messed up.
